channel.title: Small assistance with shops
channel.description: ive gotten this before, its when you talk to the npc of the shop, and you disconnect. i did fix it the first time, but it happened again and i really dont know what to do, ive tried a couple things. are there definite reasons why you disconnect? or is a source-specific problem? ill put any info needed if you need any

item.title: Small assistance with shops
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

frozon566:

if you add more item to a shop then a shop can hold it will automatically crash if you try opening the shop.

yeah im pretty sure thats what happened because after i took all the items out, it was fine. i prolly counted wrong XD

Read full topic

item.title: Small assistance with shops
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

if you add more item to a shop then a shop can hold it will automatically crash if you try opening the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Small assistance with shops
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

dds asap:

in the client.java it may have a line of code in which it tells the server what to do when you click on the npc. underneath that there may be a disconnect command.

well you see the server came with alot of this stuff, and all i did was add items to a shop that already had items in it so im just gonna reset the shop and reput the items in little by little so if i mess up i see it. thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Small assistance with shops
item.dc:creator: @dds_asap dds asap
item.description:
@dds_asap wrote:

in the client.java it may have a line of code in which it tells the server what to do when you click on the npc. underneath that there may be a disconnect command.

Read full topic

item.title: Small assistance with shops
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

dds asap:

have you checked the source code. sometimes when people copy and paste code they accidently copy disconnect codes with it. try checking it.

well its just a shop.cfg and i did check it, im pretty sure i didnt mess any of that up. ill keep trying random things. maybe just empty the shop and restart, not too hard.

Read full topic
